original_title: ‘Exclusive’ insurance plan for women from Sanasa Life Insurance
original_body_lines: Sanasa Life Insurance steps to introduce “Labandi Ran Wasi” special health insurance policy for women and it was introduced on the event of women’s day on the 8th of March 2023. Under the “Labandi Ranvasi” a protection cover is provided for ladies during the term of the policy and a saving sum at the end of the term. In the alternative without a saving value pure death cover would be provided for a very low premium. International women’s day give yourself a gift that will secure success and a price gift for you and your family.

Sanasa is one of the few companies offering life insurance specifically for women. This policy provides protection for sudden accidental death, along with life most important benefit at death full and permanent disability benefits, semi-permanent disability benefits, critical illness benefits and additional benefits for women including hospital allowance benefits and funeral settlement benefits coverage is available through this insurance.

The specialty is the monthly and period-end special offers and benefits. Accordingly prizes will be awarded in monthly draws and prizes will be awarded at the end of the promotional period. There are chances of winning gold sovereign, gold pendants and gold earrings and from General Insurance a chance to secure an additional discount on your home and building insurance. Sanasa Life Insurance has won many international awards as the fastest growing life insurance company in Sri Lanka and also making many huge changes in the insurance industry and constantly guaranteeing the insurance needs of the Sri Lankans.
